channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car crash site, 10th June
item.description:
This railing has clearly been crashed into and left severely damaged. No sign of any attempt at a clear up or repairs. Located on the corner of Burnt Ash Lane and Kynaston Road for over a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pike Close, Sundridge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree pushing wall, danger of falling over, 10th June
item.description:

item.title: White goods furniture and bins, 10th June
item.description:
There has been items dumped all along Holmdale Terrace (Hackney end) behind Stamford Hill. Please can it all be cleaned away it is blocking the pedestrian pavement.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Park, Hackney, London

item.title: Empathy, 10th June
item.description:
To book baby death certificate and new born certificates at the same place and the same time? Please be considerate of those mothers who have come to collect certificates for their baby's who have passed away. It's cruel do book it at the same time.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillman Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: HABINTEG dump garden waste over fence, 10th June
item.description:
HABINTEG housing association manage 1 Watercress Place, which is at the rear of our garden (50 Mortimer Road). Today, HABINTEG’s maintenance team cut down a large bush that grows from my garden and dumped all the waste in my garden causing severe damage.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Downham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This rubbish is often left like this., 10th June
item.description:
This rubbish is left like this and there is constant flytipping here. This attracts rats and causes mess all across the streets. It’s unacceptable, every resident of the borough pays council tax yet we have rubbish everywhere but plenty of traffic wardens. Please sort this out asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Nutcroft Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
